channel.title: Descriptive statistics on StatsNotebook - Simple. Powerful. Reproducible.
channel.description: Recent content in Descriptive statistics on StatsNotebook - Simple. Powerful. Reproducible.

item.title: Descriptive statistics
item.description: Follow our Facebook page or our developer’s Twitter for more tutorials and future updates This tutorial will give a short introduction on descriptive analysis using StatsNotebook. Descriptive statistics such as mean, standard deviation, median and interquartile range can be easily obtained using the Explore panel. We use the built-in Personality dataset in this example. This dataset can be loaded into StatsNotebook using the instructions provided here or can be downloaded from here.
